title: augment catches
body: why cant i buy the augment catches anymore ? they are present in the " loot and crafting " section but i get an error on purchase attempt . also i cant find them in the "accessories" store section

replies.body: The event is now over, and the project disruption items are no longer available.  Any left over items in your inventory may be disenchanted, though!  More information on this is available in our [project disruption](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) guide.  Hope that helps clear things up, and that you enjoyed the event!

Because Riot has removed the augment caches ... It's till 16 August ...
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ
so what can i do with the core and catche fragment leftovers?

Well I think If you don't have 3 augment cache fragments you cannot do anything ... If you have 7 core and a icon fragment you can make it permanent ... I have 1 augment cache fargment and I will wait for the next augment event  ...
Just read this - https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ
